text.autoconfig.tiab.title: Time in a Bottle
text.autoconfig.tiab.option.client.effec: CLOCK: Rotating clock on all sides of the block
PARTICLES: Flashing particles on every corner of the block
BOTH: Both effects at the same time
text.autoconfig.tiab.option.client.hud.d: HOVER: Display when hovering over a valid block
ALWAYS: Display when holding the Time in a Bottle
text.autoconfig.tiab.option.client.hud.v: Vertical offset of the HUD from the center of the screen
text.autoconfig.tiab.option.gameplay.acc: Will the Time in a Bottle accelerate block entites?
Will the Time in a Bottle accelerate randomly ticking blocks?
text.autoconfig.tiab.option.gameplay.can: If the block being accelerated is no longer able to be,
text.autoconfig.tiab.option.gameplay.one: Only the bottle with the most stored
text.autoconfig.tiab.option.gameplay.upd: How frequently, in ticks, the bottle's clock updates
text.autoconfig.tiab.option.gameplay.acc: How long, in ticks, the acceleration effect lasts
The base of the extra ticks per level equation (x in x^y)
text.autoconfig.tiab.option.gameplay.max: The exponent of the extra ticks per level equation (y in x^y)
text.autoconfig.tiab.option.gameplay.ran: The lower this value, the more frequently blocks will
be randomly ticked. (i.e. lower = faster growing)
